segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and it’s making me so angry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, doing nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall off that stool, and she won’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole kitchen is going to be ruined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, it’s ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside is a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the woman is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so bold, taking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever notice what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
